short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-Copilot for Gmail that automates freight management including quotes, loads, load updates and customer/carrier communications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LoadLogic is an innovative AI-driven logistics platform designed to ​optimize your shipment lifecycle. Our platform significantly reduces ​time spent on low-value activities by over 90%, leading to increased ​sales, improved margins, cost reductions, and stronger relationships ​with customers, carriers, and employees.

- Integrates with email client
- Classifies and labels emails based on shipment ​process status
- Extracts required data from emails and ​attachments
- Identifies missing data
- Provides context-specific actions
- Accelerates quoting - integration with 3rd party ​pricing and rating sources
- Automates load creation and load updates
- Quick replies draft responses with required info
